WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM M/V STEERSMAN
IN 16-18.24N 058-24.36W AT 281825Z FEB. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
TELEX: 42912008, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
